cyclone.name: ERIN
cyclone.current_location: about 265 mi SE of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: Turning north then north-northeast, accelerating parallel to the U.S. East Coast toward Atlantic Canada
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Likely extratropical landfall in Nova Scotia, Canada

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coast from Cape Hatteras, NC northward to Maine and Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (<10%) of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts and rough seas possible
weather_observation.rainfall: Light rainfall possible; heavy rainfall not expected
weather_observation.other_hazards: Increased swells and rip currents may disrupt port and near-shore operations
